title: 🤖🔄 Full Spectrum Trader: Autonomous Agent Simulation in Volatile Markets 📈
description: This paper introduces a comprehensive Python simulation for an autonomous trading agent utilizing reinforcement learning in a dynamic market with bonding curves. 🧠📊 Featuring stochastic fluctuations, dynamic parameters, and a partial order book, it creates realistic liquidity and price slippage scenarios. 🤖💹 The agent employs variable order sizes, enhanced state representation, and transaction history to make informed decisions through rewards and inventory penalties. 📉📈 Advanced visualizations and KPIs like Sharpe ratio provide in-depth analysis of performance and market evolution. 🚀🌐
